text: For A/B test pages, it looks like I can only delete B, not A. What do I do if I want to remove A and have B as the only option?
A is the original page and B the variant, right?

Thanks for the reply. In theory, yes…it was actually bad practice from the start, they should have been created as separate pages. Either way, I only want to publish B. I don’t even see the option to weight appearance likelihood so that I’d set B as 100% of the time, that kind of thing.
Is this maybe a restriction based on the subscription you have?
That would be pretty surprising, we have Marketing Hub Pro
I guess my only option would be to publish and then immediately go to “Choose as winner” for the one I want?
